campDetails: Join us at the Heart Health Expo to receive comprehensive cardiac screenings and nutrition consultations. Our team of healthcare professionals, including cardiologists and nutritionists, will be present to address your health needs. This event is tailored for adults aged 30 and above.

Bring your children to the Pediatric Wellness Fair at the Children's Hospital. We offer pediatric check-ups and services provided by experienced pediatricians and nurses. This event is designed for children and their parents to ensure the well-being of the younger members of the community.

The Diabetes Management Summit offers services such as blood sugar monitoring and educational workshops. Our team of healthcare professionals, including endocrinologists and diabetes educators, is dedicated to supporting individuals managing diabetes. This event is specifically designed for individuals with diabetes.

Indulge in the Women's Health Retreat at the Wellness Spa Resort. Experience women's health screenings and yoga sessions provided by our team of OB-GYNs and Women's Health Nurses. This event is open to women of all ages for a holistic approach to well-being.

Participate in the Mental Wellness Symposium at the City Auditorium. Access mental health assessments and counseling sessions provided by psychiatrists and psychologists. This event is open to individuals of all age groups, emphasizing the importance of mental well-being.

Join us at the Senior Health Expo at the Senior Community Center. Benefit from geriatric screenings and fall risk assessments conducted by our team of geriatricians and physical therapists. This event is tailored for seniors aged 65 and above, promoting health and well-being in the senior community.
